strength.name: Warm-up
strength.description: Light cardio and dynamic stretching to prepare your body
instructions: Arm circles (forward and backward) for 1 minute

strength.name: Dumbbell Squats
strength.description: Lower body exercise focusing on quads, hamstrings, and glutes
instructions: Lower your body as if sitting in a chair
Keep your back straight and chest up
Push through your heels to return to standing

strength.name: Push-ups with Handles
strength.description: Upper body exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Start in plank position with hands on handles
Lower your chest toward the ground
Push back up to starting position
Keep your core tight throughout the movement

strength.name: Dumbbell Rows
strength.description: Back exercise that also engages biceps and shoulders
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench or chair
Pull dumbbell up to your side
Complete all reps on one side before switching

strength.name: Roller Ab Workout
strength.description: Core strengthening exercise using the ab roller
instructions: Start on your knees with the roller in front of you
Roll forward as far as you can while maintaining control
Use your core to pull yourself back to starting position
For advanced, try from a standing position

strength.name: Dumbbell Lunges
strength.description: Lower body exercise targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes
instructions: Lower your body until both knees are at 90-degree angles
Push through front heel to return to starting position

strength.name: Cool Down
strength.description: Static stretching to improve flexibility and reduce muscle soreness

cardio.name: Warm-up
cardio.description: Light cardio to prepare your body for the workout

cardio.name: Jumping Jacks
cardio.description: Full body cardio exercise that increases heart rate
instructions: Stand with feet together and arms at sides
Jump and spread legs while raising arms overhead

cardio.name: High Knees
cardio.description: Cardio exercise that targets your lower body and core
instructions: Run in place, lifting knees as high as possible
Aim to bring knees to hip level
Swing arms naturally as if running

cardio.name: Mountain Climbers
cardio.description: Dynamic exercise that works multiple muscle groups while raising heart rate
instructions: Keep your core tight and back flat

cardio.name: Burpees
cardio.description: Full body exercise that combines strength and cardio
instructions: Place hands on floor and jump feet back to plank

cardio.name: Squat Jumps
cardio.description: Explosive lower body exercise that elevates heart rate
instructions: Land softly back in squat position

cardio.name: Cool Down
cardio.description: Light activity and stretching to gradually lower heart rate

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: No matter how slow you go, you're still lapping everyone on the couch.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Strength does not come from the body. It comes from the will.
motivationalQuotes.author: Gandhi

motivationalQuotes.quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
motivationalQuotes.author: Marvin Phillips

motivationalQuotes.quote: The hardest lift of all is lifting your butt off the couch.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
motivationalQuotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind that you have to convince.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you.
motivationalQuotes.author: Fred DeVito

motivationalQuotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
motivationalQuotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

motivationalQuotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn

motivationalQuotes.quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jack LaLanne

motivationalQuotes.quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
motivationalQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill

motivationalQuotes.quote: The clock is ticking. Are you becoming the person you want to be?
motivationalQuotes.author: Greg Plitt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
motivationalQuotes.author: Muhammad Ali

motivationalQuotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
motivationalQuotes.author: Bruce Lee

motivationalQuotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn

motivationalQuotes.quote: The greatest wealth is health.
motivationalQuotes.author: Virgil

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

protein.description: Essential for muscle repair and growth

carbohydrates.description: Primary energy source, choose complex carbs over simple sugars

fats.description: Important for hormone production and nutrient absorption

fiber.description: Aids digestion and helps maintain healthy blood sugar levels

water.description: Essential for all bodily functions and optimal performance

keralaCuisine.name: Brown Rice
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: High in fiber, vitamins, and minerals
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Better than white rice for blood sugar control

keralaCuisine.name: Tapioca (Kappa)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: Good source of energy and vitamin C
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Consume in moderation due to high carb content

keralaCuisine.name: Green Peas
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: Good source of plant protein and fiber
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Supports muscle growth and digestive health

keralaCuisine.name: Carrot
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Promotes eye health and immune function

keralaCuisine.name: Cucumber
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Hydrating and good for weight management

keralaCuisine.name: Coconut
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Use in moderation due to high saturated fat content

keralaCuisine.name: Fish (Sardines, Mackerel)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: High in omega-3 fatty acids and protein

keralaCuisine.name: Bitter Gourd (Pavakka)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: Low in calories, high in vitamins

keralaCuisine.name: Drumstick (Muringa)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants

keralaCuisine.name: Black Tea
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Drink without sugar for best benefits

keralaCuisine.name: Banana Chips
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: High in calories and fat when fried
keralaCuisine.healthierAlternative: Fresh bananas or baked banana chips

keralaCuisine.name: Jaggery (Sharkara)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: Contains some minerals unlike refined sugar
keralaCuisine.healthBenefits: Still high in calories, use sparingly

keralaCuisine.name: Fried Snacks (Parippu Vada, Uzhunnu Vada)
keralaCuisine.nutritionalValue: High in unhealthy fats and calories

avoidList.reason: Leads to weight gain, blood sugar spikes, and increased risk of diabetes
Quickly converts to sugar, causing energy crashes and weight gain
High in unhealthy fats and calories, linked to heart disease
Often high in sodium, preservatives, and unhealthy fats

mealPlanTips: Include protein with every meal to support muscle maintenance
Fill half your plate with vegetables for essential nutrients
Choose whole grains over refined grains for better nutrition
Eat mindfully and slowly to recognize fullness cues
Prepare meals at home to control ingredients and portions
Include a variety of colors in your meals for different nutrients
